trans-unit.source: Get the current state of your AdGuard Home instance (protection, rule filtering, safe browsing, parental filtering, or safe search). Returns 1 if enabled, 0 if disabled.

trans-unit.id: Use NextDNS? Have I got an app for you.
trans-unit.source: Use NextDNS? Have I got an app for you.

trans-unit.id: You've reached the maximum of 6 presets.

trans-unit.target: Je hebt het maximum van 6 presets bereikt.
trans-unit.note: Used on the 'Add new disable preset' screen
Used in the DNS record type picker on the 'check filtering' screen.

trans-unit.source: A list of CIDRs, IP addresses, or ClientIDs. If this list has entries, AdGuard Home will accept requests only from these clients.
trans-unit.target: A list of CIDRs, IP addresses, or ClientIDs. If this list has entries, AdGuard Home will accept requests only from these clients.

trans-unit.source: A list of CIDRs, IP addresses, or ClientIDs. If this list has entries, AdGuard Home will drop requests from these clients. This field is ignored if there are entries in Allowed clients.
trans-unit.target: A list of CIDRs, IP addresses, or ClientIDs. If this list has entries, AdGuard Home will drop requests from these clients. This field is ignored if there are entries in Allowed clients.

trans-unit.source: Not to be confused with filters. AdGuard Home drops DNS queries matching these domains, and these queries don't even appear in the query log. You can specify exact domain names, wildcards, or URL filter rules, e.g. "example.org", "*.example.org", or "||example.org^" correspondingly.
trans-unit.target: Not to be confused with filters. AdGuard Home drops DNS queries matching these domains, and these queries don't even appear in the query log. You can specify exact domain names, wildcards, or URL filter rules, e.g. "example.org", "*.example.org", or "||example.org^" correspondingly.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the duration to disable for, in minutes. Set to '0' to disable indefinitely.
trans-unit.target: Geeft aan hoe lang bescherming uitgeschakeld wordt (in minuten). Zet op '0' om bescherming voor onbepaalde tijd uit te schakelen.

trans-unit.note: MARK: v5.2 & Includes ": " at the end

trans-unit.source: During these times services blocking will be paused.
trans-unit.target: Tijdens deze tijden wordt het blokkeren van services gepauzeerd.

trans-unit.note: MARK: Changelog

trans-unit.source: The Changelog will only be shown for feature-updates, not for updates that only contain bugfixes.
trans-unit.target: De changelog zal alleen getoond worden na een update met nieuwe features, niet voor updates met alleen bugfixes.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to remove this client?
trans-unit.target: Weet je zeker dat je deze cliënt wil verwijderen?

trans-unit.note: MARK: Clients

trans-unit.source: AdGuard Home is dropping all DNS queries from these clients.
trans-unit.target: AdGuard Home blokkeert alle DNS verzoeken van deze cliënten.

trans-unit.source: Enter an IP, ClientID, or CIDR range
trans-unit.target: Typ een IP, ClientID of CIDR

trans-unit.source: Ignore this client in query log
trans-unit.target: Deze client negeren in query log

trans-unit.source: Clients can be identified by the IP address, CIDR, MAC address, or a special client ID (can be used for DoT/DoH/DoQ). Using MAC as identifier is possible only if AdGuard Home is also a DHCP server.
trans-unit.target: Apparaten kunnen worden geïdentificeerd door hun IP-adres, CIDR, MAC-adres of een speciaal apparaat-ID (kan gebruikt worden voor DoT/DoH/DoQ). Het MAC-adres gebruiken kan alleen als AdGuard Home ook DHCP server is.

trans-unit.source: Remote Pro is required to manage clients.
trans-unit.target: Remote Pro is vereist om cliënten te beheren.

trans-unit.source: These clients use AdGuard Home, but do not have a specific configuration.
trans-unit.target: Data over gebruikers die AdGuard Home gebruiken, maar niet geconfigureerd zijn.

trans-unit.source: Enable DNS caching for this client's custom upstream configuration
trans-unit.target: DNS-caching inschakelen voor de aangepaste upstream-configuratie van deze client

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to disable %@?
trans-unit.target: Weet je zeker dat je %@ wil uitschakelen?

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to enable %@?
trans-unit.target: Weet je zeker dat je %@ wil inschakelen?

trans-unit.note: MARK: v4.8
MARK: v3.0

trans-unit.source: Remote Pro is required to manage DHCP settings.
trans-unit.target: Remote Pro is vereist om DHCP instellingen te beheren.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to remove all leases and reset the lease configuration?
trans-unit.target: Weet je zeker dat je alle leases wilt resetten?

trans-unit.source: Resets all current static & dynamic leases and lease configuration, without erasing the DHCP configuration.
trans-unit.target: Reset alle leases en de lease configuratie, zonder de DHCP configuratie te wissen.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to reset the DHCP configuration?
trans-unit.target: Weet je zeker dat je de DHCP configuratie wilt resetten?

trans-unit.note: MARK: DHCP
Static Leases

trans-unit.target: Schakel bescherming uit voor alle instanties.

trans-unit.note: Durations

trans-unit.source: Enter an IP, ClientID, or CIDR range
trans-unit.target: Enter an IP, ClientID, or CIDR range

trans-unit.source: Enter a domain, wildcard, or URL filter rule
trans-unit.target: Enter a domain, wildcard, or URL filter rule

trans-unit.source: Specifies for how many seconds the clients should cache a filtered response
trans-unit.target: Hiermee geef je op hoeveel seconden de clients een gefilterd antwoord in de cache moeten opslaan

trans-unit.source: Bootstrap DNS servers are used to resolve IP addresses of the DoH/DoT resolvers you specify as upstreams.
trans-unit.target: Bootstrap DNS-servers worden gebruikt om IP-adressen op te lossen van de DoH / DoT-resolvers die u opgeeft als upstreams.

trans-unit.source: Make AdGuard Home respond from the cache even when the entries are expired and also try to refresh them.
trans-unit.target: Laat AdGuard Home reageren vanuit de cache, zelfs als de vermeldingen zijn verlopen en probeer deze ook te vernieuwen.

trans-unit.note: MARK: v4.1

trans-unit.source: List of fallback DNS servers used when upstream DNS servers are not responding.
trans-unit.target: Lijst met DNS-back-up-noodservers die worden gebruikt wanneer upstream DNS-servers niet reageren.

trans-unit.source: The DNS servers that AdGuard Home uses for local PTR queries.
trans-unit.target: De DNS-servers die AdGuard Home zal gebruiken voor zoekopdrachten naar lokaal aangeboden bronnen.

trans-unit.source: Remote Pro is required to manage DNS settings.
trans-unit.target: Remote Pro is vereist om DNS instellingen te beheren.

trans-unit.source: IP addresses excluded from rate limiting.
The number of requests per second allowed per client. Setting it to 0 means no limit.
trans-unit.target: Het aantal verzoeken per seconde toegelaten per toestel. 0 betekent onbeperkt.

trans-unit.source: Subnet prefix length for IPv4 addresses
Subnet prefix length for IPv6 addresses

Reversely resolve clients' IP addresses into their hostnames by sending PTR queries to corresponding resolvers (private DNS servers for local clients, upstream servers for clients with public IP addresses).
trans-unit.target: Indien ingeschakeld, zal AdGuard Home proberen om IP-adressen van apparaten te converteren in hun hostnamen door PTR-verzoeken te sturen naar overeenkomstige resolvers (privé-DNS-servers voor lokale apparaten, upstream-server voor apparaten met een openbaar IP-adres).

trans-unit.note: MARK: DNS

trans-unit.source: Specifies the number of seconds to wait for a response from the upstream server.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the number of seconds to wait for a response from the upstream server.

trans-unit.source: Perform reverse DNS lookups for locally served addresses using these upstream servers. If disabled, AdGuard Home responds with NXDOMAIN to all such PTR requests except for clients known from DHCP, /etc/hosts, and so on.
trans-unit.target: Omgekeerde DNS opzoekingen uitvoeren voor locale adressen door deze upstream servers te gebruiken. Indien uitgeschakeld, reageert AdGuard Home met NXDOMAIN op al dergelijke PTR-verzoeken, uitgezonderd voor apparaten gekend van DHCP, /etc/hosts, enz.

trans-unit.source: Remote Pro is required to manage DNS rewrites.
trans-unit.target: Remote Pro is vereist om DNS herschrijvingen te beheren.

trans-unit.note: MARK: v5.1
MARK: App Intents, Shortcuts, Siri

trans-unit.target: Schakel bescherming in voor alle instanties.

trans-unit.note: Add Filter
Check Hostname

trans-unit.source: Remote Pro is required to manage filters.
trans-unit.target: Remote Pro is vereist om filters te beheren.

trans-unit.note: Custom Rules

trans-unit.source: block example.org and all its subdomains for client IP 192.168.1.42
trans-unit.target: block example.org and all its subdomains for client IP 192.168.1.42

trans-unit.source: block example.org and all its subdomains
trans-unit.target: block example.org and all its subdomains

trans-unit.source: block domains matching the specified regular expression
trans-unit.target: block domains matching the specified regular expression

trans-unit.source: return 127.0.0.1 for example.org (but not its subdomains)
trans-unit.target: return 127.0.0.1 for example.org (but not its subdomains)

trans-unit.source: unblock example.org and all its subdomains
trans-unit.target: unblock example.org and all its subdomains

MARK: More

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to clear statistics? This will reset all statistics in the Dashboard to zeroes.
trans-unit.target: Weet je het zeker dat je de statistieken wil wissen? Dit reset alle statistieken in het Dashboard naar nul.

trans-unit.source: Changing the Statistics Retention setting requires an app restart.
trans-unit.target: Het aanpassen van de retentie instelling vereist een restart van de app.

trans-unit.note: Meaning 'miliseconds' duration unit in the query log or in 'average processing time'.
Displayed in Dashboard Preferences.

trans-unit.source: only visible if you have multiple instances
trans-unit.target: alleen zichtbaar als je meerdere instanties hebt
trans-unit.note: Displayed in Dashboard Preferences.

trans-unit.source: For customizing an app's language on macOS, go to 'System Preferences > Language & Region > Apps', add the app and select a language there.
trans-unit.target: Om de taal van de app te wijzigen op macOS, open 'Systeemvoorkeuren > Taal en regio > Apps' en voeg de app daar toe.

trans-unit.source: If enabled, AdGuard Home Remote will be locked whenever you close the app. You'll be prompted to authenticate when relaunching.
trans-unit.target: Wanneer ingeschakeld zal AdGuard Home Remote vergrendeld worden als je de app sluit. Je moet je authenticeren wanneer je de app opnieuw opent.

trans-unit.source: Click above to unlock AdGuard Home Remote
trans-unit.target: Klik hier om AdGuard Home Remote te ontgrendelen

trans-unit.source: Click above to unlock AdGuard Home Remote
trans-unit.target: Klik hier om AdGuard Home Remote te ontgrendelen

trans-unit.source: Tap above to unlock AdGuard Home Remote
trans-unit.target: Tik hier om AdGuard Home Remote te ontgrendelen

trans-unit.note: MARK: - Pro

trans-unit.source: Unlock power features & support future development with a one-time purchase.
trans-unit.target: Ontgrendel extra functies & support ontwikkeling van de app met een eenmalige aankoop.

trans-unit.source: Use this if you've purchased Remote Pro before on a different device, or your Pro license doesn't show up after purchasing Remote Pro.
trans-unit.target: Gebruik dit als je Remote Pro eerder hebt aangeschaft op een ander apparaat of wanneer je Pro licensie niet verschijnt na het aanschaffen van Remote Pro.

trans-unit.source:
I see you don't have an active mail client on your device, please mail me with the request to join the TestFlight including a screenshot of this Pro screen so I can see you have purchased Pro.
Please mail it to developer@rocketscience-it.nl!
trans-unit.target:
Ik zie dat je geen actieve mail-client op je apparaat hebt, mail me met het verzoek om je toe te voegen aan de TestFlight met een screenshot van dit Pro-scherm zodat ik kan zien dat je Pro hebt aangeschaft.
Je kan mailen naar developer@rocketscience-it.nl!

trans-unit.source:
Note: you're running a TestFlight build of the app, therefore payments run in Sandbox mode and do not actually process.
A Pro 'license' will invalidate every few days while on a TestFlight build. If you want to purchase Pro and use the app without this annoyance, please download the app from the App Store. Thanks!
trans-unit.target:
Note: you're running a TestFlight build of the app, therefore payments run in Sandbox mode and do not actually process.
A Pro 'license' will invalidate every few days while on a TestFlight build. If you want to purchase Pro and use the app without this annoyance, please download the app from the App Store. Thanks!

trans-unit.source: Interactive widgets do not open the app, but work straight from your home screen & lock screen. They come in different shapes and sizes!
trans-unit.target: Interactive widgets werken zonder dat de app geopend hoeft te worden, vanuit je home screen & lock screen. Ze komen in verschillende vormen en maten!
Bekijk meer dan 25 queries & stel filters in
trans-unit.note: MARK: Pro Features
MARK: v5.0

trans-unit.target: Remote Pro is vereist om meer queries te zien.

trans-unit.source: Remote Pro is required to view more queries.
trans-unit.target: Remote Pro is vereist om meer queries te zien.

trans-unit.source: Are you sure you want to clear the entire query log?
trans-unit.target: Weet je zeker dat je het hele query log wil wissen?

trans-unit.source: Queries matching these rules are not written to the query log.
trans-unit.target: Zoekopdrachten die aan deze regels voldoen, worden niet naar het query log geschreven.

trans-unit.source: Turning on 'Anonymize Client IP' will disable saving the full IP address of clients in logs and statistics.
trans-unit.target: Het aanzetten van 'Cliënt IP anonimiseren' schakelt het loggen van volledige IP adressen uit logs and statistieken.

trans-unit.note: MARK: Query Log

trans-unit.source: Rather use AdGuard DNS? I've got you covered.
trans-unit.target: Gebruik je liever AdGuard DNS? Daar is ook een app voor.

trans-unit.source:
In June 2020 I started building my own apps as an independent developer, under the name 'RocketScience IT'.
My main goal is to learn: design, development, testing, support, promotion - maybe even more! Right now, I have some apps in the store which I'm continuously improving & have many ideas for other apps I might want to make in the future.
trans-unit.target:
In juni 2020 ben ik begonnen met het maken van m'n eigen apps als indie ontwikkelaar, onder de naam 'RocketScience IT'.
Mijn doel is om te leren: ontwerpen, ontwikkelen, testen, support, marketing - misschien nog wel meer! Op dit moment heb ik een aantal apps in de App Store die ik continue verbeter. Daarnaast heb ik nog veel ideeën voor andere apps die ik wil maken in de toekomst!
Alles voor Pi-hole op één plek.

trans-unit.source: Disable protection for a certain duration.

trans-unit.note: MARK: Design

trans-unit.source: AdGuard Home will check if domain contains adult materials. It uses the same privacy-friendly API as the browsing security web service.
trans-unit.target: AdGuard Home controleert of het domein 18+ content bevat. Dit gebeurt dmv dezelfde privacy vriendelijke API als de Browsing Security web service.

trans-unit.source: You can setup blocking rules in the 'Filters' settings.
trans-unit.target: Je kan blokkeringsregels toevoegen in de 'Filters' instellingen.

trans-unit.note: Start - the following strings can be found inside 'General Settings' on the web interface

trans-unit.source: AdGuard Home will check if the domain is blocked by the browsing security web service. It will use privacy-friendly lookup API to perform the check: only a short prefix of the domain name SHA256 hash is sent to the server.
trans-unit.target: AdGuard Home controleert of het domein in de blokkeerlijst voorkomt dmv Browsing Security web service. Dit gebeurt dmv een privacy vriendelijk API verzoek:een korte prefix van de domein naam met SHA256 hash wordt verzonden naar de server.

trans-unit.source: AdGuard Home will enforce safe search in several search engines.
trans-unit.target: AdGuard Home kan veilig zoeken forceren voor verschillende zoekmachines.

trans-unit.source: Please mail me with any feedback about bugs or improvements at developer@rocketscience-it.nl!
trans-unit.target: Mail me met bugs of verzoekjes naar developer@rocketscience-it.nl!

trans-unit.source: Please use English for support requests!
trans-unit.target: Gebruik graag Nederlands of Engels voor je vragen!

trans-unit.source: Logs are recorded locally and never leave your device. Swipe down to exit the Log viewer.
trans-unit.target: Logs worden lokaal weggeschreven en verlaten nooit je device. Swipe naar beneden om de log-viewer te sluiten.

trans-unit.note: MARK: Other Settings
MARK: Preferences

trans-unit.source: Changing this setting requires an app restart.
trans-unit.target: Het aanpassen van deze instelling vereist een restart van de app.

trans-unit.note: MARK: RocketScience
MARK: - Settings

trans-unit.source: Please enter a valid port number.
Queries matching these rules are not written to the statistics.
trans-unit.target: Zoekopdrachten die aan deze regels voldoen, worden niet naar de statistieken geschreven.

trans-unit.source: If you enjoy using this app and want to support the indie developer (hi! 👋), please consider leaving a tip. I would greatly appreciate it!
trans-unit.target: Als je de app tof vindt en deze indie developer (hoi! 👋) wil steunen, kan je een donatie geven. Ik waardeer het enorm!

trans-unit.source: Thank you for your support. - Joost

Thank you so much, I really appreciate the fact that you love the app so much you're willing to give a tip. It's extremely motivating as well. I love you!
Joost
trans-unit.target:
Super erg bedankt, ik waardeer het echt enorm dat je de app zo goed vindt dat je er zelfs nog een donatie voor wil geven. Super motiverend, bedankt!
Joost

trans-unit.note: MARK: Tip Jar

trans-unit.source:
Note: you're running a TestFlight Build, therefore payments run in Sandbox mode and do not actually process.
If you want to tip, please download the app from the App Store! After that you can download the beta again. Thanks!
trans-unit.target:
Note: you're running a TestFlight Build, therefore payments run in Sandbox mode and do not actually process.
If you want to tip, please download the app from the App Store! After that you can download the beta again. Thanks!

trans-unit.source: Thank you for your generous tip!
Thank you for your generous tips!
The Tip Jar helps keep AdGuard Home Remote running and directly supports development of awesome features and improvements.
trans-unit.target: De fooienpot support me direct om AdGuard Home Remote te blijven onderhouden en nieuwe features te ontwikkelen.

trans-unit.note: MARK: Apple Watch
Placeholder of the 'custom header value' textfield in instance settings.

trans-unit.source: This can take a while. If the app is stuck on this screen, please try reinstalling it. Sorry for the inconvenience!
trans-unit.target: Dit kan even duren. Als de app vast zit op de spinner, probeer de app opnieuw te installeren. Sorry voor het ongemak!

trans-unit.note: MARK: Widgets

trans-unit.source: Quickly toggle protection for a certain duration.
trans-unit.target: Een snelle manier om bescherming uit te zetten voor een korte periode.
